articles.title: ‘I’m traumatized’: Dentist warns you shouldn’t be using flossing picks. Here’s why - The Daily Dot

articles.content:
Flossing picks are such a handy tool for the noncommittal or squeamish flosser. 
If you need a quick and easy way to clean the area between your teeth, they might work in a pinch. But unless youre u… [+3492 chars]
